Class CheckoutScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • CS3450.course_project.userInterface.CheckoutScreen

  • public class CheckoutScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Melanie Pena CS 3450 Course Project Grocery Store Checkout This class will be for the checkout screen that is displayed after the checkout button on the main screen is clicked
